chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat

Goal:
{l : lb | g_nlb n l}

Premises:
Inductive g_nlb : nat -> lb -> Prop := in_gnlb_0 : g_nlb 0 nil | in_gnlb_1 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 0 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> g_nlb n (⟘ :: l) | in_gnlb_2 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 1 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> g_nlb n (⟙ :: l) Arguments g_nlb _%nat_scope _%list_scope Arguments in_gnlb_1 [n]%nat_scope [l]%list_scope Arguments in_gnlb_2 [n]%nat_scope [l]%list_scope
Notation lb := (list bool)
prime.prime_decomp : forall n : nat, n <> 0 -> {l : list nat | n = fold_right mul 1 l /\ Forall prime.prime l}
Inductive g_nlb : nat -> lb -> Prop := in_gnlb_0 : g_nlb 0 nil | in_gnlb_1 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 0 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> g_nlb n (⟘ :: l) | in_gnlb_2 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 1 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> g_nlb n (⟙ :: l) Arguments g_nlb _%nat_scope _%list_scope Arguments in_gnlb_1 [n]%nat_scope [l]%list_scope Arguments in_gnlb_2 [n]%nat_scope [l]%list_scope
g_nlb_fun : forall (n : nat) (l1 l2 : lb), g_nlb n l1 -> g_nlb n l2 -> l1 = l2
g_nlb_ind : forall P : nat -> lb -> Prop, P 0 nil -> (forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 0 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> P (div n 2) l -> P n (⟘ :: l)) -> (forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 1 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> P (div n 2) l -> P n (⟙ :: l)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : lb), g_nlb n l -> P n l
g_nlb_sind : forall P : nat -> lb -> SProp, P 0 nil -> (forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 0 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> P (div n 2) l -> P n (⟘ :: l)) -> (forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 1 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> P (div n 2) l -> P n (⟙ :: l)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : lb), g_nlb n l -> P n l
in_gnlb_1 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 0 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> g_nlb n (⟘ :: l)
in_gnlb_2 : forall (n : nat) (l : lb), n <> 0 -> rem n 2 = 1 -> g_nlb (div n 2) l -> g_nlb n (⟙ :: l)
lb_pointwise = fun f : bool -> bool -> bool => fix lb_pointwise (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => match m with | nil => nil | _ :: _ => map (f ⟘) m end | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => map (fun x0 : bool => f x0 ⟘) l | y :: m0 => f x y :: lb_pointwise l0 m0 end end : (bool -> bool -> bool) -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_pointwise _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope
map_app_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (m n : list Y), map f ll = m ++ n -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ m = map f l /\ n = map f r}}
lb_meet = lb_pointwise andb : lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_meet (_ _)%list_scope
lb_join = lb_pointwise orb : lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_join (_ _)%list_scope
lb_mask_equiv = fun l m : lb => l ⪯ m /\ m ⪯ l : lb -> lb -> Prop Arguments lb_mask_equiv (_ _)%list_scope
In_list_assoc : forall (X Y : Type) (eq_X_dec : eqdec X) (x : X) (l : list (X * Y)), In x (map fst l) -> {y : Y | list_assoc eq_X_dec x l = Some y /\ In (x, y) l}
destruct_list : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), {x : A & {tl : list A | l = x :: tl}} + {l = nil}
prime.expand = fix expand (p : nat) (l : list nat) {struct l} : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | x :: l0 => x + p * expand p l0 end : nat -> list nat -> nat Arguments prime.expand _%nat_scope _%list_scope
lb_complement : forall a b : lb, {c : lb | b ⟂ c /\ a ↑ b ≂ c ↑ b}
lb_minus : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\ b ≂ a ↑ c}
list_split_length : forall (X : Type) (ll : list X) (k : nat), k <= length ll -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ length l = k}}
list_pick : forall (X : Type) (ll : list X) (k : nat), k < length ll -> {x : X & {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ length l = k}}}
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
Inductive lb_mask : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_mask_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⪯ l | in_lb_mask_1 : forall l : lb, l ⪯ nil -> ⟘ :: l ⪯ nil | in_lb_mask_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x ⪦ y -> l ⪯ m -> x :: l ⪯ y :: m Arguments lb_mask (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_1 [l]%list_scope Arguments in_lb_mask_2 (_ _)%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
map_middle_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (m : list Y) (y : Y) (n : list Y), map f ll = m ++ y :: n -> {l : list X & {x : X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ x :: r /\ map f l = m /\ f x = y /\ map f r = n}}}
lb_nat = fix lb_nat (l : lb) : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | x :: l0 => bool2nat x + 2 * lb_nat l0 end : lb -> nat Arguments lb_nat _%list_scope
map_cons_inv : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) (ll : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), map f ll = y :: m -> {x : X & {l : list X | ll = x :: l /\ f x = y /\ map f l = m}}
Ascii.N_of_digits = fix N_of_digits (l : lb) : BinNums.N := match l with | nil => BinNums.N0 | b :: l' => BinNat.N.add (if b then BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH else BinNums.N0) (BinNat.N.mul (BinNums.Npos (BinNums.xO BinNums.xH)) (N_of_digits l')) end : lb -> BinNums.N Arguments Ascii.N_of_digits _%list_scope

```coq
induction n using g_nlb_ind.
- exists nil. constructor.
- destruct IHn as [l Hl].
  + destruct (prime_decomp (div n 2)) as [l' Hl'].
    exists (if rem n 2 =? 0 then ⟘ :: l' else ⟙ :: l').
    constructor; auto.
  + destruct (prime_decomp (div n 2)) as [l' Hl'].
    exists (if rem n 2 =? 0 then ⟘ :: l' else ⟙ :: l').
    constructor; auto.
Qed.

original: induction n using g_nlb_ind. - exists nil. constructor. - destruct IHn as [l Hl]. + destruct (prime_decomp (div n 2)) as [l' Hl']. exists (if rem n 2 =? 0 then ⟘ :: l' else ⟙ :: l'). constructor; auto. + destruct (prime_decomp (div n 2)) as [l' Hl']. exists (if rem n 2 =? 0 then ⟘ :: l' else ⟙ :: l'). constructor; auto.
